title: Starting an Argument
description: Use their relations, stories and past events to logically decide which team member makes the most sense.

title: Isolating or Seeking Solace

title: Becoming Anxious
description: The character succumbs to anxiety, making things clearly worse for others. Everyone gains 1 Stress and the character is of little help.

title: Lashing Out
description: The character not only starts an argument but becomes actively aggressive, potentially causing a fight (see Lashing Out, pg 97).

title: Becoming Uncooperative
description: The character blames others for their current situation, becoming stubborn and unwilling to cooperate.
